3.差分实现区间改/区间查

$$
sum[i]=\sum_{j=1}^i c[j] \times(i-j+1)
\
sum[i]=(i+1) \times \sum_{j=1}^i c[j] -\sum_{j=1}^i c[j] \times j
$$
